responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "1B6B5DCD412CBA960BEA32B6CA51E907", "Perhaps. Even so, it\'s best not to belittle the poison of their stingers. It\'s the amber they bring which keeps me going. They say it\'s worth something to the nomads of Sandsquall, the valorous Zephyr Wind. If you\'re willing, you should take the amber fossils to one of their collection sites. They\'d be pleased to see it.")
name: EVT_SAN_0001_ScorpionCharmer_Quest_DLG_5_Response
